description:
Boasting a shared lounge, Western Hotel - Madinat Zayed is set in Madīnat Zāyid and also provides a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a kids' club, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk.

The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel rooms include a wardrobe and a private bathroom.

Western Hotel - Madinat Zayed offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

The accommodation offers a children's playground. Guests can enjoy playing billiards and table tennis, or take advantage of the business centre.

Transfers to and from Abu Dhabi International Airport are available on a request basis from the hotel and at a cost.
